trans-unit.source: Describes a color in terms of alpha, red, green, and blue channels.
trans-unit.target: Descreve uma cor em termos de canais alfabéticos, vermelhos, verdes e azuis.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML Values *predefinedColor* One of the colors predefined by the class.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML ``` - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - ``` # # XAML valores *predefinedColor* um as cores predefinidos pela classe.

trans-unit.source: *rgb* A three-digit hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: *RGB* um número hexadecimal de três dígitos.

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the second digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the third digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro dígito Especifica a cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>valor, o segundo dígito Especifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>valor e o terceiro dígito Especifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `00F`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `00F`.

trans-unit.source: *argb* A four-digit hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: *ARGB* um número hexadecimal com quatro dígitos.

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the second digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Dígito primeiro Especifica a cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>valor, o segundo dígito Especifica respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>valor, dígito seguinte especifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>valor e dígito final Especifica respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `F00F`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `F00F`.

trans-unit.source: *rrggbb* A six-digit hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: *rrggbb* um número hexadecimal de seis dígitos.

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Os primeiros dois dígitos especifique a cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>valor, especifique as duas seguintes respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>valor e as duas finais especificam respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `0000FF`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `0000FF`.

trans-unit.source: *aarrggbb* An eight-digit hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: *aarrggbb* um número hexadecimal oito dígitos.

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Os primeiros dois dígitos especifique a cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>valor, especifique as duas seguintes respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>valor, especifique as duas seguintes respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>valor e as duas finais especificam respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `FF0000FF`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `FF0000FF`.

trans-unit.source: *scA* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> The color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: *scA* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> a cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> </xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *scR* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> The color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: *scR* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> a cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> </xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *scG* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> The color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: *scG* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> a cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> </xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *scB* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> The color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: *scB* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> a cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> </xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *profileUri* <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile.
trans-unit.target: *profileUri* <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] cor perfil.</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *alphaValue* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> The alpha channel color value.
trans-unit.target: *alphaValue* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> cor canal alfa.</xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value range is 0.0 to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo de valor está entre 0,0 e 1,0.

trans-unit.source: *colorValue* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> A comma-delimited list of three to eight values that represent the color channels of the color profile.
trans-unit.target: *colorValue* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> uma lista delimitada por vírgulas dos valores de três para oito que representam os canais de cor do perfil de cor.</xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value range is 0.0 to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo de valor está entre 0,0 e 1,0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""></xref> alpha channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""> </xref> valor alfa canal da cor.

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure determines the amount of transparency the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> has.
trans-unit.target: O canal alfa de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>estrutura determina a quantidade de transparência da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>tem.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>

trans-unit.source: An alpha value of 255 indicates the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> is completely opaque and a value of 0 indicates the color is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: Um valor alfa 255 indica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>é completamente opaco e um valor de 0 indica a cor é completamente transparente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (A, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the ScRGB channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: O `sRGB` canais (A, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) e os canais de ScRGB (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>estrutura estão sincronizados propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when A, the `sRGB` alpha channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` alpha channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando um, o `sRGB` alfa canal, modificação, o `ScRGB` alfa canal, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, é convertido para o equivalente intervalo de valor utilizando o 0-1 a `Sc` esquema suporta.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""></xref> alpha channel value of the color, a value between 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""> </xref> valor alfa canal a cor, um valor entre 0 e 255.

trans-unit.source: Adds two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona dois <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estruturas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures are added together by adding the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the first color to the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the second color.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>as estruturas são adicionadas em conjunto, adicionando os canais alfabéticos, vermelhos, verdes e azuis da cor de primeiro para os canais alfabéticos, vermelhos, verdes e azuis da segunda cor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>

trans-unit.source: For example, the alpha channel of `color1` and the alpha channel of `color2` are added together to produce the alpha channel of the resulting color.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o canal alfa de `color1` e o canal alfa de `color2` são adicionados em conjunto para produzir o canal alfa da cor resultante.

trans-unit.source: The same is done with the red, green, and blue channels to produce the red, green, and blue channels of the new color.
trans-unit.target: O mesmo é feito com os canais vermelho, verdes e azuis para produzir os canais vermelho, verdes e azuis da cor novo.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estrutura para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estrutura para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure whose color values are the results of the addition operation.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estrutura cujos valores de cor são os resultados da operação de adição.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structures for fuzzy equality.
trans-unit.target: Compara dois <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estruturas de igualdade difusa.

trans-unit.source: This equality method compensates for the fact that floating-point values can acquire a small amount of error when operated upon.
trans-unit.target: Este método de igualdade compensates para o facto de que os valores de vírgula flutuante podem adquirir uma pequena quantidade de erro quando operado após.

trans-unit.source: The first color to compare.
trans-unit.target: A cor de primeiro a comparar.

trans-unit.source: The second color to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda cor a comparar.

trans-unit.source: if color1 and color2 are nearly identical; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if color1 and color2 are nearly identical; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""></xref> blue channel value of the color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""> </xref> azul valor do canal da cor.

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, B) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: O `sRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, B) e o `ScRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>estrutura estão sincronizados propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when B, the `sRGB` blue channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` blue channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando B, o `sRGB` azul canal, modificação, o `ScRGB` canal azul, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>, é convertido para o equivalente intervalo de valor utilizando o 0-1 a `Sc` esquema suporta.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""></xref> blue channel value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure, a value between 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_sRGB" name="sRGB" href=""> </xref> azul valor de canal do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estrutura, um valor entre 0 e 255.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScRGB" name="ScRGB" href=""></xref> channels of the color to within the gamut of 0 to 1, if they are outside that range.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScRGB" name="ScRGB" href=""> </xref> canais da cor para dentro da gama de 0 a 1, se encontrarem fora desse intervalo.

trans-unit.source: The gamut of the `ScRGB` color space is larger than the clamp range, so the use of this method may result in the loss of color information.
trans-unit.target: A gama do `ScRGB` espaço de cor é maior do que o intervalo de clamp, pelo que a utilização deste método pode resultar na perda de informações de cor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile of the color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] perfil da cor de cores.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile contains a color system profile for a particular application or device such as a color printer.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] perfil de cor contém um perfil de sistema de cor para uma determinada aplicação ou dispositivo, como uma impressora de cor.

trans-unit.source: This profile is matched to a common profile that in turn can be mapped to the individual profiles of other devices.
trans-unit.target: Este perfil é correspondido a um perfil comum que por sua vez, pode ser mapeado para os perfis de outros dispositivos individuais.

trans-unit.source: This allows the color system used by one computer device to match the colors from other applications and devices on the same or other computer systems.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite que o sistema de cor utilizado pelo dispositivo de um computador para corresponder as cores de outras aplicações e dispositivos no mesmo ou outros sistemas de computador.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile of the color.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] perfil da cor de cores.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified object is a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure and is equivalent to this color.
trans-unit.target: Testa se o objeto especificado é um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estrutura e é equivalente para esta cor.

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon.
trans-unit.target: Valores de vírgula flutuante podem adquirir um pequeno grau de erro quando estes são utilizadas após.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operator, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>método, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A>operador e o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A>operador não compensar o utilizador para este e, por conseguinte, não pode devolver o resultado booleano esperado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>método utiliza um algoritmo de igualdade difusa compensates para este erro aritmético de vírgula flutuante devolvendo `true` para uma comparação dos dois <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>estruturas que sejam praticamente idênticos, mas cujos valores podem diferir por uma quantidade minuscule.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: O objeto comparar a este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o objeto especificado for um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estrutura e é idêntica à atual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estrutura; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Testes se especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estrutura é idêntica para esta cor.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estrutura é idêntica à atual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estrutura; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Valores de vírgula flutuante podem adquirir um pequeno grau de erro quando estes são utilizadas após.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operator, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>método utiliza um algoritmo de igualdade difusa compensates para este erro aritmético de vírgula flutuante devolvendo `true` para uma comparação dos dois <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>estruturas que sejam praticamente idênticos, mas cujos valores podem diferir por uma quantidade minuscule.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel of a color determines the amount of transparency of the color.
trans-unit.target: O canal alfa de uma cor determina a quantidade de transparência da cor.

trans-unit.source: An alpha value of 255 indicates that the color is completely opaque, and a value of 0 indicates that the color is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: Um valor alfa de 255 indica que a cor é completamente opaco e um valor de 0 indica que a cor é completamente transparente.

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, the sRGB red channel, is modified the ScRGB red channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, is transformed to the equivalent value.

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, G, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: O `sRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, G, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) e o `ScRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>estrutura estão sincronizados propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when G, the `sRGB` green channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` green channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando G, o `sRGB` verde canal, modificação, o `ScRGB` canal verde, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, é convertido para o equivalente ao intervalo de valor utilizando o 0-1 a `Sc` esquema suporta.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>

trans-unit.target: O valor de multiplicar pelo.

trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estrutura cujos valores de cor são os resultados da operação multiplicação.

trans-unit.source: Adds two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona dois <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estruturas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures are added together by adding the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the first color to the alpha, red, green, and blue channels of the second color.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>as estruturas são adicionadas em conjunto, adicionando os canais alfabéticos, vermelhos, verdes e azuis da cor de primeiro para os canais alfabéticos, vermelhos, verdes e azuis da segunda cor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>

trans-unit.source: For example, the alpha channel of `color1` and the alpha channel of `color2` are added together to produce the alpha channel of the resulting color.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o canal alfa de `color1` e o canal alfa de `color2` são adicionados em conjunto para produzir o canal alfa da cor resultante.

trans-unit.source: The same is done with the red, green, and blue channels to produce the red, green, and blue channels of the new color.
trans-unit.target: O mesmo é feito com os canais vermelho, verdes e azuis para produzir os canais vermelho, verdes e azuis da cor novo.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estrutura para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estrutura para adicionar.

trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estrutura cujos valores de cor são os resultados da operação de adição.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> structures are identical.
trans-unit.target: Testa se dois <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estruturas são idênticas.

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon.
trans-unit.target: Valores de vírgula flutuante podem adquirir um pequeno grau de erro quando estes são utilizadas após.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> method, the Equality operator, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>método, o operador de igualdade e o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A>operador não compensar o utilizador para este e, por conseguinte, não pode devolver o resultado booleano esperado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Inequality%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>método utiliza um algoritmo de igualdade difusa compensates para este erro aritmético de vírgula flutuante devolvendo `true` para uma comparação dos dois <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>estruturas que sejam praticamente idênticos, mas cujos valores podem diferir por uma quantidade minuscule.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>

trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> estrutura para comparar.

trans-unit.source: if color1 and color2 are exactly identical; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if color1 and color2 are exactly identical; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values can acquire a small degree of error when they are operated upon.
trans-unit.target: Valores de vírgula flutuante podem adquirir um pequeno grau de erro quando estes são utilizadas após.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> operator, and the Inequality operator do not compensate for this and thus may not return the expected Boolean result.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>método, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A>operador e o operador de Inequality não compensar o utilizador para este e, por conseguinte, não pode devolver o resultado booleano esperado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.op_Equality%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A> method uses a fuzzy equality algorithm that compensates for this floating-point arithmetic error by returning `true` for a comparison of two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structures that are practically identical, but whose values may differ by a minuscule amount.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>método utiliza um algoritmo de igualdade difusa compensates para este erro aritmético de vírgula flutuante devolvendo `true` para uma comparação dos dois <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>estruturas que sejam praticamente idênticos, mas cujos valores podem diferir por uma quantidade minuscule.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.AreClose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, R, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.
trans-unit.target: O `sRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, R, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) e o `ScRGB` canais (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>estrutura estão sincronizados propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when R, the `sRGB` red channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` red channel, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, is converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando R, o `sRGB` canal vermelho, modificação, o `ScRGB` canal vermelho, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, é convertido para o equivalente intervalo de valor utilizando o 0-1 a `Sc` esquema suporta.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure determines the amount of transparency the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> has.
trans-unit.target: O canal alfa de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>estrutura determina a quantidade de transparência da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>tem.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>

trans-unit.source: An alpha value of 1 indicates the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> is completely opaque and a value of 0 indicates the color is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: Um valor alfa de 1 indica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>é completamente opaco e um valor de 0 indica a cor é completamente transparente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color>

trans-unit.source: The `sRGB` channels (<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>) and the `ScRGB` channels (ScA, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>) of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure are synchronized properties.

trans-unit.source: For example, when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>, the `sRGB` alpha channel, is modified, the `ScRGB` alpha channel, ScAis converted to the equivalent value using the 0-1 range that the `Sc` scheme supports.
